attributes.title: Unfair
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and when I tipped why is trump a good candidate it has no reason but how much he’s worth in the money industry so his just for the money

attributes.title: this app burned down my house!!!
attributes.review: i downloaded the app today and it sold my information to telemarketers, causing me to get calls repeatedly. this angered and annoyed my dog, and she shoved a towel in the oven while it was on. she then took the burning towel and placed it on my rug and the entire house proceeded to burn down. can’t believe this! don’t download the app.

attributes.title: It’s Terrible
attributes.review: I’ve never seen such vulgar, and stupid content on an app -1/10 don’t even think about downloading this.

attributes.title: I hate donald trump

attributes.title: Terrible app.

Just everything about it, is definitely 🙅‍♂️

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
